SELECT acctCode, acctName, acctGroup, SUM(CASE WHEN yearMonth = #{prevYm} THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS prevAmt, SUM(CASE WHEN yearMonth = #{curYm} THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS currAmt FROM ( -- 일반 전표 SELECT TO_CHAR(J.JRN_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS yearMonth, J.ACCT_CODE AS acctCode, A.ACCT_NAME AS acctName, SUBSTR(J.ACCT_CODE, 1, 1) AS acctGroup, CASE WHEN J.DC_TYPE = 'D' THEN J.AMOUNT ELSE J.AMOUNT END AS amount FROM JOURNAL J JOIN ACCOUNT A ON J.ACCT_CODE = A.ACCT_CODE WHERE J.COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND (TO_CHAR(J.JRN_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = #{prevYm} OR TO_CHAR(J.JRN_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = #{curYm}) AND J.STATUS = 'closed'
UNION ALL
-- 급여 전표 SELECT TO_CHAR(H.PAY_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS yearMonth, P.ACCT_CODE AS acctCode, A.ACCT_NAME AS acctName, SUBSTR(P.ACCT_CODE, 1, 1) AS acctGroup, CASE WHEN P.DC_TYPE = 'D' THEN H.TOTAL_DEBIT ELSE -H.TOTAL_DEBIT END AS amount FROM PAYROLL_HIST H JOIN PAYROLL_JRN_HIST P ON H.HIST_CODE = P.HIST_CODE JOIN ACCOUNT A ON P.ACCT_CODE = A.ACCT_CODE WHERE H.COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} AND (TO_CHAR(H.PAY_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = #{prevYm} OR TO_CHAR(H.PAY_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = #{curYm}) ) GROUP BY acctCode, acctName, acctGroup ORDER BY acctGroup, acctCode
